price: Àti pé (ó tún rí bẹ́ẹ̀) nítorí kí Allāhu lè ṣàfọ̀mọ́ àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo àti nítorí kí Ó lè run àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́.
arabic: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَمۡحَقَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waliyumaḥḥiṣa al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayamḥaqa al-kāfirīna
